Name: Boomerang Woman
About the game: This is an orthodox horizontal scrolling 2D action game 'Platformer'. A player will control 'Kyoko Senbonbashi', who always stands on the side of justice, to defeat an evil organization 'Dokuro-dan' by using a boomerang thrown to 8 directions and passing all 8 stages that each consists of 2 areas and a final boss. A Boomerang thrown to 8 directions! 8 stages and 8 bosses. Once you pass a stage, you can go back and redo as much as you want! Enjoy playing anytime! Simple stages and infinite replay! A beginner gamers can enjoy as well..! An advanced gamers can try no mistake no damage to get 'Score 100'! Playing with a controller is recommended.
